version_description: Several bug fixes for smooth user experience.
This version solves several bugs and includes improvements on the user interface.

Contains improvements for user experience.
Also crashes a few bugs we detected on the way.

We now offer a 3-day free trial.
Bug fixes.

Impressions now has lip-sync! Don’t think you can do a great impression? Pick your favorite quote or song and start lip-syncing. Choose sounds from the prepared library or upload your own!

Small bug fixes.

Impressions now has lip-sync! Don’t think you can do a great impression? Pick your favorite quote or song and start lip-syncing. Choose sounds from the prepared library or upload your own!

... and small bug fixes.
Impressions now has lip-sync! Don’t think you can do a great impression? Pick your favorite quote or song and start lip-syncing. Choose sounds from the prepared library or upload your own!

Lipsync has more advanced features with this update. You're able to change the speed and choose the starting position of any audio. Comes in handy with lip sync and music.
More bugs fixed as usual.
Minor bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes.
Improvements on user interface. Bug removals.
Minor bug fixes.
Small updates and minor bug fixes.
Small updates and minor bug fixes.

- Includes iOS 14 related updates.
- Changes for faster video processing and stability.

Fixed minor bugs that were affecting iOS13 users.
Updated our video encoder for faster uploads and less battery usage.

We have improved on device video editing and upload speed to use less battery power and other resources.
Also crushed a few bugs on the way.
This update solves a problem that causes a random crash for some of our users.
We corrected a bug causing cached files stay longer than necessary.

Welcome Spanish and Portuguese speaking impressionists!
This update localizes Impressions for Spanish and Portuguese speaking users. Additionally, there is a new tutorial videos to help new users learn about Impressions.
Faster encoding, new upload warnings and a streamlined onboarding system.

Added a countdown button to video recording.
Fixes to language localizations.
Other minor bug fixes.

Added in-app message localization
New alphabetical celebrity scroll
Other minor bug and encoding fixes
Fixed crash that occured for some users while loading social feed.
Updated the user interface to make the video creation process more efficient and video sharing/downloading more intuitive.

Bug fixes and improvements in this version include:
- Fixed stability and performance issues
